mapper.select: SELECT SELL_PRODUCT_NUM, USER_NUM, SELL_PRODUCT_NAME, SELL_PRODUCT_DISCOUNT_PRICE, SELL_PRODUCT_EXPIRE_DATE, SELL_PRODUCT_STOCK, SELL_PRODUCT_STATUS, SELL_PRODUCT_PICKUP, SELL_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_METHOD, SELL_PRODUCT_SHIPPING_METHOD, SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE_UPLOAD_PATH, SELL_PRODUCT_THUMBNAIL FROM tbl_sell_product WHERE USER_NUM = #{userNum} ORDER BY 1 DESC limit #{criteria.limit}, 10
SELECT COUNT(SELL_PRODUCT_NUM) FROM tbl_sell_product WHERE USER_NUM = #{userNum}

SELECT SELL_PRODUCT_NUM, SELL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY, SELL_PRODUCT_NAME, SELL_PRODUCT_ORIGIN_PRICE, SELL_PRODUCT_DISCOUNT_PRICE, SELL_PRODUCT_EXPIRE_DATE, SELL_PRODUCT_STOCK, SELL_PRODUCT_STATUS, SELL_PRODUCT_PICKUP, SELL_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_METHOD, SELL_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_ADDRESS1, SELL_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_ADDRESS2, SELL_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_ADDRESS3, SELL_PRODUCT_SHIPPING_METHOD, SELL_PRODUCT_ADDRESS, SELL_PRODUCT_ADDRESS_DETAIL, SELL_PRODUCT_ADDRESS_POST_NUM, SELL_PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, SELL_PRODUCT_PHONE, SELL_PRODUCT_THUMBNAIL, SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE, SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE_UPLOAD_PATH, SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE_UUID FROM tbl_sell_product WHERE SELL_PRODUCT_NUM = #{sellProductNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_sell_product SET SELL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY = #{sellProductCategory}, SELL_PRODUCT_NAME = #{sellProductName}, SELL_PRODUCT_ORIGIN_PRICE = #{sellProductOriginPrice}, SELL_PRODUCT_DISCOUNT_PRICE = #{sellProductDiscountPrice}, SELL_PRODUCT_EXPIRE_DATE = #{sellProductExpireDate}, SELL_PRODUCT_STOCK = #{sellProductStock}, SELL_PRODUCT_PICKUP = #{sellProductPickup}, SELL_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_METHOD = #{sellProductDeliveryMethod}, SELL_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_ADDRESS1 = #{sellProductDeliveryAddress1}, SELL_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_ADDRESS2 = #{sellProductDeliveryAddress2}, SELL_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_ADDRESS3 = #{sellProductDeliveryAddress3}, SELL_PRODUCT_SHIPPING_METHOD = #{sellProductShippingMethod}, SELL_PRODUCT_ADDRESS = #{sellProductAddress}, SELL_PRODUCT_ADDRESS_DETAIL = #{sellProductAddressDetail}, SELL_PRODUCT_ADDRESS_POST_NUM = #{sellProductAddressPostNum}, SELL_PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION = #{sellProductDescription}, SELL_PRODUCT_PHONE = #{sellProductPhone}, SELL_PRODUCT_THUMBNAIL = #{sellProductThumbnail}, SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE = #{sellProductImage}, SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE_UPLOAD_PATH = #{sellProductImageUploadPath}, SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE_UUID = #{sellProductImageUuid} WHERE SELL_PRODUCT_NUM = #{sellProductNum}
mapper.select: select tbp.BILL_PRODUCT_LIST_NUM, tbp.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM, tbp.BILL_ORDER_NUM, tbp.USER_NUM as USER_NUM, tbp.BILL_PRODUCT_QUANTITY, tbp.BILL_PRODUCT_PRICE, tbp.BILL_DELIVERY_METHOD, tbp.BILL_STATUS, tbp.BILL_COOKING_TIME, tsp.USER_NUM as SELL_USER_NUM, DATE_FORMAT(tb.BILL_ORDER_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') as Bill_ORDER_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(tb.BILL_ORDER_DATE,'%H:%i') as Bill_ORDER_DATE_TIME, tsp.SELL_PRODUCT_THUMBNAIL, tsp.SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE_UPLOAD_PATH, tb.BILL_DELIVERY_ADDRESS, tb.BILL_DELIVERY_ADDRESS_DETAIL, tb.BILL_DELIVERY_ADDRESS_POST_NUM, tsp.SELL_PRODUCT_NAME, tu.USER_PHONE from tbl_bills_product tbp left join tbl_sell_product tsp on tbp.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM = tsp.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM left join TBL_BILLS tb on tbp.BILL_ORDER_NUM = tb.BILL_ORDER_NUM left join tbl_user tu on tb.USER_NUM = tu.USER_NUM where tbp.BILL_STATUS = 3 and tsp.USER_NUM = #{userNum} ORDER BY 1 DESC limit #{criteria.limit}, 10

select count(tbp.BILL_PRODUCT_LIST_NUM) from tbl_bills_product tbp left join tbl_sell_product tsp on tbp.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM = tsp.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM where tbp.BILL_STATUS = 3 and tsp.USER_NUM = #{userNum}
